project_descr: Support the national development priorities through capacity building in the formulation, coordination, monitoring and evaluation of development policies  through strengthening the national capacity to mobilize donor resources for their implementation.

outputs.output_descr: The output of the project is targeted through capacity building in the formulation, coordination, monitoring and evaluation of development policies and programmes and through strengthening the national capacity to mobilize donor resources for their implementation. The project provides policy advice, funding for visits and study tours, training, consultancy missions and short term sub-projects, through the identified directions of activity: Aid Coordination Management, Policy Advice to the Government in the areas covered by the national development priorities, Communication support to the Government, etc. Capacity building needs are identified and discussed jointly by the Government and UNDP throughout the period of project implementation. The design of activities within the project are flexible, to allow the government to quickly respond to emerging needs.

project_title: umbrella - improved capacities for managing development
